AppWebUseCaseTitle$: Use case(s) for portable html data components
AppWebUseCaseSubTitle: Split your html into html data fragments for reuse!

UseCaseList.UseCaseIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M4 5a1 1 0 011-1h14a1 1 0 011 1v2a1 1 0 01-1 1H5a1 1 0 01-1-1V5zM4 13a1 1 0 011-1h6a1 1 0 011 1v6a1 1 0 01-1 1H5a1 1 0 01-1-1v-6zM16 13a1 1 0 011-1h2a1 1 0 011 1v6a1 1 0 01-1 1h-2a1 1 0 01-1-1v-6z' /></svg>
UseCaseList.UseCaseInfo: Developers building mobile apps can view their app component without deploying it in a server
Designers/Developers building dynamic mockups/prototypes can share components without hosting it in a public server

UseCaseList.UseCaseIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M9 5H7a2 2 0 00-2 2v12a2 2 0 002 2h10a2 2 0 002-2V7a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2M9 5a2 2 0 002 2h2a2 2 0 002-2M9 5a2 2 0 012-2h2a2 2 0 012 2m-6 9l2 2 4-4' /></svg>
UseCaseList.UseCaseInfo: Developers/Testers testing mobile hybrid components can test on actual device without packaging it in a mobile hybrid app

UseCaseList.UseCaseIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M3 5h12M9 3v2m1.048 9.5A18.022 18.022 0 016.412 9m6.088 9h7M11 21l5-10 5 10M12.751 5C11.783 10.77 8.07 15.61 3 18.129' /></svg>
UseCaseList.UseCaseInfo: Easily build Multi-Language websites By Using Language specific Html Data Components defined in Json in Multiple App Domains
